text: But even his imagination, luckily for him, did not visualise the awful truth - that Morfyyd Owen was already qualifying for the title of "First Woman to Enter Space." "Where are we going, Mam?" inquired little Cadwallader when his child mind grasped the fact that the green earth was falling away at a rate of knots. Name Andreas Kosmala
